subject: 2025 Flu Vaccination Program
body:
Good afternoon colleagues,
We are pleased to announce that WSP is once again offering all employees the opportunity to receive their annual influenza vaccination. The flu vaccination is a safe and effective way to protect yourself against serious illness caused by the most common strains of the virus. We encourage all staff to take advantage of this fast and free service by booking today.
This year, you have the flexibility to either:
Book an appointment with a nurse at one of our major offices, or
Access a pharmacy voucher to use at a participating pharmacy.
Important:
Please ensure you use your WSP email address when making a nurse booking or accessing a voucher. This program is exclusively for WSP employees and cannot be shared externally.
To book an appointment with a nurse or access a voucher, please click the
WSP Global Booking Link
or scan the
QR code below
. Detailed instructions are provided in the attached
"How to Book a Vaccination"
and
"How to Claim a Pharmacy Voucher"
guidance documents attached.
